attributes.action: To stop dangerous & illegal parking outside schools in the uk
attributes.background: This very common practice is causing nuisance & safety issues to residents, pedestrians & other road users. Creating antisocial behavior & serious safety issues

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Parking restrictions on local roads are the responsibility of local councils. 

If you're concerned about parking outside schools in your local area, you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

If you'd like the Government or Parliament to take action to address this issue across the country, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
